message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to do?

I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $130. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $128. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $132. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $132. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $129. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $131. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $131. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
